The choice Cy = 1 implies that we equate the renormalization and factorization scales to the invariant mass of the photon pair, 4p = yr = Q, in the fixed- order and asymptotic contributions P(Q, Qr,y,Q.) and A(Q, Qr,y, 2.4). We use two-loop expressions for the running electromagnetic and strong couplings a(j:) and ag(j), as well as the NLO parton distribution function set CTEQ6M with Qing = 1.3 GeV. For calculations with explicit final-state fragmentation functions included, we use set 1 of the NLO photon fragmentation functions from Ref. . In this setion, we present our results for the Tevatron p¯p ollider operating at √S = 1.96 TeV.
